mapper.select: select USER_ID, ASSESSTIME, TOTALUNIT from priceset where ASSESSTIME >= str_to_date(#{startTime}, '%Y-%m-%d') and ASSESSTIME <= str_to_date(#{endTime}, '%Y-%m-%d') and status = '0' UNION ALL ( select b.USER_ID, b.ASSESSTIME, b.TOTALUNIT from ( select USER_ID, max(ASSESSTIME) as ASSESSTIME from priceset where ASSESSTIME < str_to_date(#{startTime}, '%Y-%m-%d') and status = '0' group by USER_ID order by USER_ID, ASSESSTIME ) a inner join priceset b on a.USER_ID = b.USER_ID and a.ASSESSTIME = b.ASSESSTIME ) order by USER_ID, ASSESSTIME
